parameters.definition: Units of cocoa required for one milk chocolate bar
Units of milk required for one milk chocolate bar
Units of cocoa required for one dark chocolate bar
Units of milk required for one dark chocolate bar
Proportion of the number of milk chocolate bars to dark chocolate bars
Production time for one milk chocolate bar
Production time for one dark chocolate bar

description: A small chocolate shop makes milk chocolate and dark chocolate bars. Milk chocolate bars require \param{CocoaMilk} units of cocoa and \param{MilkMilk} units of milk. Dark chocolate bars require \param{CocoaDark} units of cocoa and \param{MilkDark} units of milk. The shop has \param{TotalCocoa} units of cocoa and \param{TotalMilk} units of milk available. In addition, since milk chocolate sells better, at least \param{MilkDarkRatio} times as many milk chocolate bars need to be made as dark chocolate bars. If making a milk chocolate bar takes \param{TimeMilk} minutes and making a dark chocolate bar takes \param{TimeDark} minutes, how many of each should they make to minimize total production time?
